org.springframework.http.server.reactive

类 HttpHandlerAdapterSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.http.server.reactive.HttpHandlerAdapterSupport
  • 直接已知子类:
    ReactorHttpHandlerAdapter, RxNettyHttpHandlerAdapter, ServletHttpHandlerAdapter, UndertowHttpHandlerAdapter

    public abstract class HttpHandlerAdapterSupport
extends Object
    Base class for adapters from native runtime HTTP request handlers to a reactive HttpHandler contract.

    Provides support for delegating incoming requests to a single or multiple HttpHandlers each mapped to a distinct context path. In either case sub-classes simply use getHttpHandler() to access the handler to delegate incoming requests to.

    从以下版本开始:
    5.0
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

    • 构造器详细资料

      • HttpHandlerAdapterSupport

        public HttpHandlerAdapterSupport(HttpHandler httpHandler)
        Constructor with a single HttpHandler to use for all requests.
        参数:
        httpHandler - the handler to use

      • HttpHandlerAdapterSupport

        public HttpHandlerAdapterSupport(Map<String,HttpHandler> handlerMap)
        Constructor with HttpHandlers mapped to distinct context paths. Context paths must start but not end with "/" and must be encoded.

        At request time context paths are compared against the "raw" path of the request URI in the order in which they are provided. The first one to match is chosen. If none match the response status is set to 404.

        参数:
        handlerMap - map with context paths and HttpHandlers.
        另请参阅:
        ServerHttpRequest.getContextPath()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getHttpHandler

        public HttpHandler getHttpHandler()
        Return the HttpHandler to delegate incoming requests to.
